ovdesc.p: This ‘H’ type table contains information about additional Payment Participants and Customer Detail fields in a SEPA XML Message.
Following payment participants and their detailed payment information will be supported by the SEPA.PAYM.PARTICIPANTS application:

desc.p: This field is used to identify the type of the inputted Payment Participant.
Maximum 4 times it can be multivalued.
This field is only used for Participant Type ULTMTCRED and ULTMTDEBT, because the names of Creditor and Debtor will be inputted in the FT record or by field mapping in SEPA.LAYOUT.
This field is only used for Participant Type ULTMTCRED and ULTMTDEBT, because the address line of Creditor and Debtor will be inputted in the FT record or by field mapping in SEPA.LAYOUT.
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric) and maximal number of Multi Sub Value is 2.
This field is used only used for Participant Type ULTMTCRED and ULTMTDEBT, because the Country Code of Creditor and Debtor will be inputted in the FT record or by field mapping in SEPA.LAYOUT.
Value upto 2 type A(Alphanumeric) and must exist in COUNTRY Application.
Identifies the kind of Identification for the SEPA message.
This field becomes mandatory, if IDENT.FLAG = OrgId.
Value upto 11 type A(Alphanumeric)and must exist in DE.BIC Application.
This field is mandatory for IDENT.FLAG OrgId or PrvtId.
This field contains the name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.
This field contains the name of the identification scheme, in a free text form.
This field contains the issuer of this payment.
The field contains the date of birth.This field becomes mandatory if IDENT.FLAG is PrvtId.
This field will be used only, if IDENT.FLAG is PrvtId.
The field contains the city of birth.This field becomes mandatory if IDENT.FLAG is PrvtId.
The field contains the country of birth.This field becomes mandatory if IDENT.FLAG is PrvtId.
Value upto 2 type A(Alphanumeric) and must exist in COUNTRY Application.
The field contains the country of residence.This field becomes mandatory if IDENT.FLAG is PrvtId.
Value upto 2 type A(Alphanumeric) and must exist in COUNTRY Application.
